select oi.id, oi.code, oi.order_name, oi.user_id, oi.total, oi.create_date, oi.remark, oi.status, oi.staff_ids, oi.pay_date, oi.goods_type, oi.images, oi.weight, oi.height, oi.width, oi.start_address_id, oi.end_address_id, oi.delivery_date, oi.logistics_info, oi.finish_date, oi.kilometre, oi.distribution_price, oi.order_price, oi.discount_id, oi.after_order_price, oi.integral, ui.name as userName, ui.images as userImages, ei.id as evaluateId, ui.phone from order_info oi left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) left join staff_info si on (si.id = oi.staff_ids) left join evaluate_info ei on (ei.order_id = oi.id) where 1 = 1
AND di.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.code},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.userName},'%')
AND di.order_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.orderName},'%')
AND ui.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.phone},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{orderInfo.userId}
AND si.user_id = #{orderInfo.staffIds}
AND oi.status = '1'
order by oi.create_date desc
